claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The image shows a fragment of the full prescribing information for Flublok. Under the “Indications and Usage” section it states: “Flublok is a vaccine indicated for active immunization … Flublok approved for use in persons 18 years of age and older.” This text directly confirms that Flublok is approved for adults aged 18 years and older, supporting the claim.
